name: Next.js + Styled Components
description: CSS-in-JS approach with Next.js and Styled Components. Ideal for teams preferring component-scoped styling with full JavaScript integration.

aiContext.designPhilosophy: Component-driven styling with CSS-in-JS. Styles live with components for better maintainability. Supports dynamic theming and props-based styling.
aiContext.colorGuidance: Teal primary palette for a fresh, modern feel. Use theme providers for consistent color access. Support both light and dark modes.
aiContext.componentGuidance: Create styled components with meaningful names. Use props for style variations. Leverage theme context for global design tokens.
aiContext.accessibilityNotes: Styled Components works well with semantic HTML. Ensure focus styles are properly defined. Use aria attributes appropriately.
